text:
Network scanners leave my apache webserver in a state in which access from localhost/AllowList gets 403 (forbidden) status.  

Even though, restarting apache resolves this issue but it causes production downtime. 

Note that My apache configuration (000-default.conf) places IP restrictions on the root directory and the network scanner always gets 403 when it perform scans.

You'll need to provide much more concrete detail to report a bug -- bugzilla is not for bug reporting, not support.
